body.p: In developing the requirements set out in paragraph BC211, the Board considered whether entities should be required:

li.p: to apply retrospectively the revised impairment test for goodwill; and
to apply retrospectively the requirement prohibiting reversals of impairment losses for goodwill and therefore eliminate any reversals recognised before the date the revised Standard was issued.
